model_description.name: BasicMultiplier
model_description.description: A basic multiplier model that accepts two numeric inputs (arg1 and arg2), processes them, and outputs their product.

inputs.name: arg1
inputs.description: The first input argument for the multiplier. Represents an integer.

inputs.name: arg2
inputs.description: The second input argument for the multiplier. Represents an integer.

outputs.name: product
outputs.description: The output representing the product of arg1 and arg2.

requirements: Generate multiple test cases to test the boundaries for arg1 and arg2, including minimum, typical, and maximum values.
